meanings.sent1: I intermix the colors to create a new shade.
meanings.sent2: She likes to intermix different ingredients in her recipes.
meanings.sent3: The artist decided to intermix paint colors for a surprising effect.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the flowers intermix like a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The DJ skillfully intermixes songs to keep the party going.

meanings.sent1: They intermix the spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The architect chose to intermix modern and traditional styles in the building design.
meanings.sent3: The students intermix their ideas to create a unique project.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the dish intermix harmoniously, creating a delightful taste.
meanings.sent5: The colors intermix seamlessly in the sunset sky.

meanings.sent1: At the party, people from different backgrounds intermix and have fun together.
meanings.sent2: The rivers intermix at the delta, forming a larger body of water.
meanings.sent3: The diverse flavors intermix in the buffet, offering a culinary adventure.
meanings.sent4: The cultures in the city intermix, creating a vibrant community.
meanings.sent5: The scents of flowers and herbs intermix in the garden, creating a fragrant atmosphere.
